name: Modulos
description:
Welcome to Modulos!

  • Use WASD to move
  • Press E to shoot (when applicable)
  • In EDIT MODE, drag and drop pieces to attach them to your robot. Press Q and E while holding a piece to rotate it.
  • Get to the exit after destroying all enemies (and land mines)

Thank you so much for playing! Please leave a comment! 

p.s. I stayed up until 3am to get this finished, but there are a few bugs. If you encounter a bug and can't beat a level, press Escape then "Restart Level"
